message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. This is a great deal for you as it's significantly lower than its true value to me. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet. I can lower my price to $9,800. This is still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still unable to go above $9,600 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
